mapper.select: SELECT zx_order.id, zx_order.order_code, zx_order.order_num, zx_order.file_url, zx_order.`status`, zx_order.pay_time, zx_order.pay_id, zx_order.pay_code, zx_order.create_time, zx_order.create_id, zx_order.update_time, zx_order.update_id, zx_order.printer_id, zx_order.printer_code, zx_order.order_user_code, zx_order.order_user_id, zx_file_manager_ab.id, zx_file_manager_ab.file_code, zx_file_manager_ab.file_name, zx_file_manager_ab.category_id, zx_file_manager_ab.file_url, zx_file_manager_ab.file_num, zx_file_manager_ab.abstracts, zx_file_manager_ab.create_time, zx_file_manager_ab.create_id, zx_file_manager_ab.update_time, zx_file_manager_ab.update_id, zx_file_manager_ab.category_code, zx_file_manager_cde.id, zx_file_manager_cde.file_code, zx_file_manager_cde.file_name, zx_file_manager_cde.category_id, zx_file_manager_cde.file_url, zx_file_manager_cde.file_num, zx_file_manager_cde.abstracts, zx_file_manager_cde.create_time, zx_file_manager_cde.create_id, zx_file_manager_cde.update_time, zx_file_manager_cde.manager_id, zx_file_manager_cde.update_id, zx_file_manager_cde.user_id, zx_file_manager_cde.category_code, zx_order_pay.id, zx_order_pay.pay_code, zx_order_pay.pay_status, zx_order_pay.order_id, zx_order_pay.order_code, zx_order_pay.pay_time, zx_order_pay.create_time, zx_order_pay.create_id, zx_order_pay.update_time, zx_order_pay.update_id, zx_printer_manager.id, zx_printer_manager.printer_code, zx_printer_manager.`name`, zx_printer_manager.longitude, zx_printer_manager.latitude, zx_printer_manager.province, zx_printer_manager.city, zx_printer_manager.area, zx_printer_manager.address, zx_printer_manager.remark, zx_printer_manager.create_id, zx_printer_manager.create_time, zx_printer_manager.update_id, zx_printer_manager.update_time, zx_printer_manager.manager_name, zx_printer_manager.manager_phone FROM zx_order , zx_file_manager_ab , zx_file_manager_cde , zx_order_pay , zx_printer_manager WHERE zx_order.file_url = zx_file_manager_ab.file_url OR zx_order.file_url = zx_file_manager_cde.file_url AND zx_order.pay_id = zx_order_pay.id AND zx_order.printer_id = zx_printer_manager.id
